meanings.definition: A parasitic worm of a large group that includes many important parasites of humans and domestic animals.
meanings.sent1: The strongyle was found in the intestines of the cow.
meanings.sent2: Farmers must regularly deworm their livestock to prevent strongyle infestations.
meanings.sent3: The strongyle threw a party in the cow's stomach, but the cow wasn't invited!
meanings.sent4: The strongyle's presence in the animal's body was like a silent invader, causing harm without notice.
meanings.sent5: The veterinarian showed a vivid image of a strongyle to educate the farmers about the parasite.

meanings.definition: Any nematode worm of the family Strongylidae.
meanings.sent1: The strongyle was identified as a member of the Strongylidae family.
meanings.sent2: Researchers studied the behavior of the strongyle in laboratory conditions.
meanings.sent3: The strongyle family reunion was a wriggling success!
meanings.sent4: The Strongylidae worms intertwined like a complex puzzle in the soil.
meanings.sent5: Children in the science class were amazed by the detailed drawings of the Strongylidae strongyle.
